snippet.title: Quadroids - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Quadroids is a single-player puzzle platformer with a twist! Don’t be fooled by its simple pixel-art style and put your neocortex to the test while you try to control 4 screens by yourself and clear 100+ mind-twisting levels!

One button control one screen. How simple is this?
Too hard for one brain? Ask up to 4 friends to play with you and take over some screens control!
Streamers can also play with their community by using twitch commands integrated in the game. Be ready to sacrifice your viewers!

Quadroids is coming on February 22, 2024 on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 (PlayStation 5 compatible) and Xbox One. (Xbox Series compatible)

A free demo is available on consoles today!

Xbox : https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/quadroids-demo/9mwln64cscx0
PS4 : https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP8016-CUSA45208_00-QUADR00GAMEUSA01
Nintendo Switch : Coming tomorrow!
Wishlist now :
PC :  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2419690/Quadroids/
Nintendo Switch : https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/quadroids-switch/
PS4 : https://store.playstation.com/en-US/concept/10008900
Xbox : https://www.xbox.com/fr-fr/games/store/quadroids/9p3jj89bhz4b
